abilities.name: Camouflage Gas
abilities.effect: If Weezing is Confused and is Knocked Out, your opponent can't take a Prize card.

attacks.name: Damage Breakdown
attacks.effect: Count the number of damage counters on Weezing. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon and Weezing is now Confused.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
